title: The Works of His Hands, Sy Garte,  PhD, Biochemistry,  Theoretical Biology
description:
Sy Garte, PhD in Biochemistry, formerly with the NIH
His new book, The Works of His Hands, which contains his story as well as some of the issues relating to origin of life, will be available on November 19.
More information available at https://theworksofhishands.com
Blog:  https://thebookofworks.com
We discuss complex dynamical systems, theoretical biology, theoretical gene regulatory networks and theoretical issues related to the origin of life.
Former New Atheist, then agnostic, and finally at home in Jesus Christ.
Atheism is also a faith. All faith is based on evidence.
Many New Atheists now promote the idea that free will does not exist. Perhaps believing in a deterministic universe absolves one of the necessity or obligation of responsibility to the Source of our free will.
The possibility of determinism and the purely materialist world view died with the understanding of quantum mechanics, since we know now that the quantum world is purely stochastic.
Filled with gratitude for the Holy Spirit's patience and mercy and grace.
The Works of His Hands: A Scientist's Journey from Atheism to Faith
Learn more: https://www.amazon.com/dp/0825446074/ref=cm_sw_em_r_mt_dp_U_dVZTDb
Q2J3R2B
Sy's favorite hymns are Amazing Grace:
https://youtu.be/CDdvReNKKuk
and Great is Thy Faithfulness.
Karen's favorite songs are Give Me Jesus: https://youtu.be/DmR0z4EWUjw
Untitled Hymn:  https://youtu.be/PANiveIKVX0
Victory in Jesus
